note_app.views.count_top_tags¶

note_app.views.count_top_tags(user, number_of_tags=10, min_font_size=10, max_font_size=28)¶

Count and return top tags used by the user with dynamic font sizes.

Parameters:

  • user – The user whose tags should be analyzed.

  • number_of_tags – Number of top tags to retrieve. Default = 10.

  • min_font_size – Minimum font size. Default = 10

  • max_font_size – Maximum font size. Default = 28

Returns:

List of top Tag objects with font_size attribute.
